SALESFORCE HELP

VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Performance and Security: Improve Discovery and Elevate Trust

Reinforce the trust that your buyers have in your storefront, and deliver incremental performance gains across your storefront. Take advantage of improvements in how B2B Commerce for Visualforce loads data for certain pages and widgets.

Rebuild Your Product Index to Include New Fields
Deliver a better user experience on the Product List page version 2.0 with a flatter data structure for the CC Product Index object. Your buyers can now enjoy faster loading and rendering of product data, which helps them browse your products and place orders more efficiently.
Account for CSR Permission Set Changes
The B2B Commerce CSR permission set that the managed package installs now includes updated Visualforce page access, object settings, and Apex class permissions. These changes address gaps in the permission set that sometimes caused parts of the customer service representative (CSR) flow to not function correctly.
Populate Search Autocomplete Suggestions More Quickly
Deliver a better experience to your buyers when they begin typing in a storefront search field and see a list of suggested results. When you use the Product List page version 2.0, B2B Commerce for Visualforce now returns autocomplete suggestions with a SOSL query of your product index records. With this change, search autocomplete and the Product List page can reference the same data source, which results in fewer database queries for your storefront.
Maintain Trust with Third-Party JavaScript Dependencies
Keep your storefront current with the most recent versions of the open-source JavaScript libraries used by the B2B Commerce Visualforce pages. This release updates several libraries used for rendering components and their behaviors. These libraries are well tested and their changes don't break any existing functionality on your pages.
Cache More Types of Storefront Data
Enjoy improved performance when pricing entitled products, populating the wish list selector component, and querying for items in the shopping cart. B2B Commerce for Visualforce can now cache this data in your org's Platform Cache partition.
Load Mini-Cart Content More Quickly
Improve the user experience on pages where the mini-cart component is enabled. B2B Commerce for Visualforce now loads content in the mini-cart more efficiently.
Migrate to sObject Configurations (Enforced)
Ensure that you’ve migrated your storefront’s metadata to the required format. This release removes the Migrate Page Settings option from CC Admin, and requires all solutions to migrate their legacy page settings to sObject configuration data.

title: B2B Commerce for Visualforce Performance and Security Improvements
